full_sentence: My beliefs are based upon personal experiences and observations I've made throughout my life in this beautiful state that I'm proud to call home, but am also ashamed to say has an extremely toxic population of welfare loving bumper wealthy liberals that have destroyed the two largest cities in the state - Detroit and Flint. I HATE them down to my very core. They either destroy or defund everything they come into contact with. They smack their lips screaming

and are ignorant to the proven fact that without capitalism they would STILL be huddled together in the bush hiding from and killing each other over livestock. These liberals have actually now leveled the continent of Africa to the point where diseases that we've not seen in centuries are being spread in the outhouses and rivers they use. Disgraceful.

topics.sentence_slice: extremely toxic population of welfare loving bumper wealthy liberals
